meta.article_title: May 8, 2023 - Five Tips to Increase Forehand Looping Power

debutant.proche_pied: Use a wider stance, with your legs farther apart.

intermediaire.bras_contre_ballon: As you backswing, bring your wrist back as well, so that it can naturally snap through the ball during contact.

intermediaire.rotation_body: Contact the ball more from your side as your body is rotating.

avance.facile_puissance: Focus on 'easy power,' where you let the muscles smoothly contract in rough order from bottom to top (from legs to forearm & wrist), rather than try to spastically 'muscle' the ball.

exercices_complementaires.description: Practice a wider stance and weight transfer.
Practice snapping your wrist through the ball during contact.
Practice looping with body rotation, focusing on contacting the ball from your side as you rotate.

erreurs_a_eviter.description: Try to avoid using raw power and instead focus on smooth, controlled movements.
Avoid swinging mostly with your arm and instead focus on using your body rotation.
